full_text.full_text:
The Curse of Dimensionality (2/2)
▪ Problem for classification
– There are not enough data objects to allow the creation of a model that 
reliably assigns a class to all possible objects
▪ Problem for clustering
– The distance between objects become less meaningful
1. The amount of training 
data needed to cover 
80% of the space 
grows exponentially
2. Nearly all objects 
become far from each 
other
36
